languages.text: "Солдаты словно единовременно заснули. И больше не проснулись".

traits.locale_text: "Солдаты словно единовременно заснули. И больше не проснулись".

languages.text: "It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."
languages.original_text: "Солдаты словно единовременно заснули. И больше не проснулись".

traits.locale_text: "All the soldiers seemingly fell asleep at once. And never woke up again."
"All the soldiers seemingly fell asleep at once. And never woke up again."
"It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."
"It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."
"It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."

languages.text: “看来这些士兵们一下子就昏睡了过去，再也没有醒来过。”
languages.original_text: "It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."

traits.locale_text: “看来这些士兵们一下子就昏睡了过去，再也没有醒来过。”

languages.text: «Parece que todos los soldados se durmieron a la vez. Y nunca más despertaron».
languages.original_text: "It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que todos los soldados se durmieron a la vez. Y nunca más despertaron».

languages.text: 「兵士たちは一斉に眠りについたようです。そして、二度と目覚めることはなかった」
languages.original_text: "It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."

traits.locale_text: 「兵士たちは一斉に眠りについたようです。そして、二度と目覚めることはなかった」

languages.text: "Anscheinend sind die Soldaten alle gleichzeitig eingeschlafen. Und nie wieder aufgewacht."
languages.original_text: "It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."

traits.locale_text: "Anscheinend sind die Soldaten alle gleichzeitig eingeschlafen. Und nie wieder aufgewacht."

languages.text: « On dirait que les soldats se sont endormis d'un seul coup. Pour ne plus jamais se réveiller. »
languages.original_text: "It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."

traits.locale_text: « On dirait que les soldats se sont endormis d'un seul coup. Pour ne plus jamais se réveiller. »

languages.text: "Görünen o ki askerler bir anda uyuyakalmış. Bir daha da uyanmamışlar."
languages.original_text: "It seems the soldiers fell asleep all at once. And never woke again."
